<!-- Workspace instructions for magical storytelling experience -->

## Project Overview
Next.js 14 magical storytelling web experience with:
- Portal entrance homepage with dual doors
- Sacred Space campfire writing interface  
- Transformation Chamber with visual AI processing
- Constellation visualization of shared stories
- Growth Garden gamification
- Emotional design with sound and animations

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion (animations)
- Howler.js (audio)
- Firebase (auth + database)
- React Three Fiber (3D constellation)

## Development Guidelines
- Prioritize smooth animations and micro-interactions
- Use warm color palette (blues, golds) for emotional safety
- Implement progressive disclosure - reveal features gradually
- Focus on emotional impact over technical complexity
